column4: what boot-locale should i use for burning my ubuntu-image? (i dont know what it means)
but figured to burn an iso-image i needed to use something that's not the windows raw function
i only just joined, forgive me if im off subject, are you trying to burn an iso using nero ?
nah its fine, ill help you if you like
yes, well, i think i did it already
ahh good, you did tick the finish cd button aswell ?

well if the cd doesnt load even after it says burn complete, chances are you need to tick the finilise cd tickbox. which means itll close the cd properly and not leave it open for more files later etc (multisession)
okay, i think i said i did not want to create a multisession.
yeah shouldnt have a problem then
